tool.name: Model training
tool.description: Trains a model (or multiple models) using CellOrganizer

param.name: model1
param.label: model1

param.name: model2
param.label: model2

param.name: model3
param.label: model3

param.name: model4
param.label: model4

param.name: model5
param.label: model5

param.name: model6
param.label: model6

param.name: synthesis
param.label: Select the desired structures to be synthesized

param.name: numimgs
param.label: Number of instances to be synthesized

param.name: resolution
param.label: Provide a desired resolution if images are to be synthesized

param.name: prefix
param.label: Provide a prefix for saved files

param.name: compression
param.label: Image Compression

param.name: microscope
param.label: Microscope (optional)

param.name: sampling_method
param.label: Select a sampling method

param.name: verbose
param.label: If true, prints all information during synthesis (advanced feature)

param.name: debug
param.label: If true, saves intermediate results (advanced feature)

param.name: randomwalk
param.label: If sampling from a diffeomorphic model, true will perform a random walk through the shapespace for the desired number of steps

param.name: walksteps
param.label: If performing a random walk, provide the number of desired steps

param.name: walktype
param.label: Select the type of random walk desired

param.name: tif
param.label: If true, instances will be saved as tiffs

param.name: indexed
param.label: If true, will return an indexed tif with indices corresponding to channels

param.name: blender
param.label: If true, will return object and wavefront files for use in blender simulations

param.name: sbml
param.label: If true, will return sbml spatial files for use in molecular simulation

tool.help:
**Description**
Synthesize instances from multiple trained models saved in multiple formats.
-----
**Output**
A zip containing the desired output files.
